name: tm22
effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
